parameters:
Come on. We’re going to secure the route for the main team.

Let’s go!

Shinra troops!


We'll kill anyone who stands in our way!
Entry into this area is forbidden! Leave now.
You two stay here until the main team arrives.
\n<Tseng>Your orders are to patrol Sector 8. This is standard work for all new Turks. It’s company tradition. Rude, Reno, and even I started off with this kind of work.

There’s no need to go that far.  The war is over and the town is peaceful, so I doubt you’ll run into any big problems. Treat this patrol just like you would a real mission. It will help prepare you for your future duties.
Roger. Sounds kind of boring, but I guess I have to start somewhere..
\n<Tseng>Cissnei, give me a report of what happened.
\nI was just attacked by two men.
They kept saying "Down with Shinra!" I think they were plotting an attack.
We need to know more. Scout the area and see if there are any more of those men around.
The long awaited day of Shinra’s downfall is finally in sight! The anticipation is killing me!

We can’t mess things up now.


\{DOWN WITH SHINRA!
What do you two think you're doing?
I guess you overheard our plans.
We're going to have to get rid of you.
The long awaited day of Shinra’s downfall is finally in sight! The anticipation is killing me!

We can’t mess things up now.


\{DOWN WITH SHINRA!
What do you two think you're doing?
I guess you overheard our plans.
We're going to have to get rid of you.
